item.title: Tests
item.description: git submodule git submodule add cloning a project with submodules git clone SOME-PROJECT git submodule init git submodule update or use this: git clone –recurse-submodules SOME-PROJECT

举目见月，不见长安 something Once the CPU has been switched into 32-bit protected mode, the process by which it translates logical addresses to physical addresses is completely different: rather than multiply the value of a segment register by 16 and then add to it the offset, a segment register becomes an index to a particular segment descriptor (SD) in the GDT. A segment descriptor is an 8-byte structure that defines the following properties of a protected-mode segment: Base address (32 bits), which defines where the segment begins in physical memory Segment Limit (20 bits), which defines the size of the segment Various flags When the computer boots, the BIOS doesn’t know how to load the OS, so it delegates that task to the boot sector.
git term checkout - for branch rebase ? reset HEAD awk awk -F ‘ ’ ‘{sum+=$2*@4} END {print sum}’ file calculate sum of tow clumns’ mul.

平时多烧香，临时抱佛脚 commands of spacemacs SPC + ! : run shell commands SPC f y : show and copy curren file path SPC l s : save layout SPC l L : load layout SPC s s : search currence of a word in current buffer SPC s S : similar as the above SPC v : select outer region SPC x a : align code
本欲度众生 反被众生度

js 反混淆 site : http://www.bm8.com.cn/jsConfusion/ hydra syntax: hydra [[[-l LOGIN | -L FILE] [-p PASS | -P FILE]] | [-C FILE ]] [-e ns] [-o FILE] [-t TASKS] [-M FILE [-T TASKS]] [-w TIME] [-f] [-s PORT] [-S] [vV] server service [OPT] -R continue cracking from last cracking -s -l -P -f stop after finding one match service : telnet ftp pop3[-ntlm] imap[-ntlm] smb smbnt http[s]-{head|get} http-{get|post}-form http-proxy cisco cisco-enable vnc ldap2 ldap3 mssql mysql oracle-listener postgres nntp socks5 rexec rlogin pcnfs snmp rsh cvs svn icq sapr3 ssh2 smtp-auth[-ntlm] pcanywhere teamspeak sip vmauthd firebird ncp afp
